subitem.label: Click on the help button (?) at the lower left part of the dialog and Confirm the help tray opens and is usable. Try All Topics, search, bookmarks.
Close the tray and verify that clicking the help button (?) behaves the same way as pressing F1. Exit the preferences dialog.

item.title: Non resizeable dialogs
item.description: Repeat the previous step using a non-resizeable dialog. Help/Tips and tricks is such a dialog. The help should open externally and not in a tray.

item.title: Short dialog
item.description: Try with a resizable dialog after making it short short. The dialog should grow a bit to accommodate the tray, then go back to original size when the tray is closed.
